Q_DESC:
To write a program in which the user has to perform operations in a linked list.
Task is to make a linked list and delete exactly the middle element of the linked list. The user has to display the liked list before deletion as well as the linked list after deleting the middle element.
INPUT:
1 2 3 4
OUTPUT: 
Gven Linked List
1->2->3->4->NULL
Linked List after deletion of middle
1->2->4->NULL
TESTCASE_1:
1 2 3 4
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Gven Linked List
1->2->3->4->NULL
Linked List after deletion of middle
1->2->4->NULL
TESTCASE_2:
1 3 5 6
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Gven Linked List
1->3->5->6->NULL
Linked List after deletion of middle
1->3->6->NULL
TESTCASE_3:
3 5 6 8
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Gven Linked List
3->5->6->8->NULL
Linked List after deletion of middle
3->5->8->NULL
